(id) - initWithCGColorSpace:
 Initializes a newly allocated colorspace object with the specified color space. This is the designated initializer.

Member Function Documentation

+ (CPColorSpace *) genericRGBSpace  

Returns a shared instance of CPColorSpace initialized with the standard RGB space.

For the iPhone this is CGColorSpaceCreateDeviceRGB(), for Mac OS X CGColorSpaceCreateWithName(kCGColorSpaceGenericRGB).

Returns:
A shared CPColorSpace object initialized with the standard RGB colorspace.
- (id) initWithCGColorSpace: (CGColorSpaceRef)  colorSpace  

Initializes a newly allocated colorspace object with the specified color space. This is the designated initializer.

Parameters:
colorSpace The color space.
Returns:
The initialized CPColorSpace object.
